kit.title: CIDAR MoClo Parts Kit
kit.description: Golden-gate based modular cloning kit for E. coli

assemblies.title: Transcriptional Unit AE
assemblies.description: Plasmid with a transcriptional unit starting and ending with fusion sites A (GGAG) and E (GCTT)

assemblies.title: Transcriptional Unit EF
assemblies.description: Plasmid with a transcriptional unit starting and ending with fusion sites E (GCTT) and F (CGCT)

assemblies.title: Transcriptional Unit FG
assemblies.description: Plasmid with a transcriptional unit starting and ending with fusion sites F (CGCT) and G (TGCC)

assemblies.title: Transcriptional Unit GH
assemblies.description: Plasmid with a transcriptional unit starting and ending with fusion sites G (TGCC) and H (ACTA)

assemblies.title: Transcriptional unit
assemblies.description: 5'UTR (with RBS) + promoter + CDS + terminator flanked by Golden Gate adapters

assemblies.title: Pre-composed 5'UTR + promoter + CDS
assemblies.description: A level 0 plasmid contains a precomposed 5'UTR + promoter + CDS

assemblies.title: PCR-based targeting
assemblies.description: Amplify a plasmid fragment adding homology arms to replace a region in the genome.

kit.title: MoClo YTK
kit.description: Golden-gate based modular cloning kit for yeast.

assemblies.title: CDS self-replicating plasmid
assemblies.description: A plasmid with a yeast ORI containing a CDS

assemblies.title: 2xCDS fusion self-replicating plasmid
assemblies.description: A plasmid with a yeast ORI with two CDS fused together

assemblies.title: 3xCDS fusion self-replicating plasmid
assemblies.description: A plasmid with a yeast ORI with three CDS fused together

assemblies.title: CDS integration plasmid
assemblies.description: A plasmid containing a CDS that can be integrated in the genome via recombination

assemblies.title: 2xCDS integration plasmid
assemblies.description: A plasmid containing a 2xCDS fusion protein that can be integrated in the genome via recombination

assemblies.title: 3xCDS integration plasmid
assemblies.description: A plasmid containing a 3xCDS fusion protein that can be integrated in the genome via recombination
